summary: A group of cryptographers have analyzed the eiDAS 2. 0 regulation (electronic identification and trust services) that defines the new EU Digital Identity Wallet.
title: Security Analysis of the EU’s Digital Wallet

summary:
What do you think about music.  I'm not sure I understand the subtle,
almost pathological appeal music has in practically every society in the
world.  Children love to sing and are often prodded into reluctant
performances by their elders...
title: Music to My Ears

summary:
This move has been coming for a long time. 
The Biden administration on Thursday said it’s banning the company from selling its products to new US-based customers starting on July 20, with the company only allowed to provide software updates to existing customers through September 29.  The ban—­the first such action under authorities given to the Commerce Department in 2019­—follows years of warnings from the US intelligence community about Kaspersky being a national security threat because Moscow could allegedly commandeer its all-seeing antivirus software to spy on its customers
title: The US Is Banning Kaspersky

summary: To celebrate, here’s a picture of Smudge looking his most Chaotic Demonic: Also, I’m opening the comments up for the last week for people to catch up.  Thank you all for your patience and thank you to the WordPress technical folks for getting the comments back on track.  — JS
title: Comments Are Back!

summary: Learn how I use AI to enhance my blog posts and generate unique images, making the writing process smoother and more enjoyable
title: How I Create (Images for) My Blog Posts

summary: A supportive message to a fellow blogger about the importance of community and the impact of writing, even when the response seems small
title: Re: Equally different

summary:
We must learn to:

Live in it
Live on it
Navigate it
Surf it
Swim in it
Sail on it
Dive in it
Understand it
Love it
Cherish it
Embrace it

But, above all, don’t drown in it
title: Life is an Ocean

summary:
This chapter might be one of the most feature-packed yet, bringing the highly requested timer feature and major improvements to wake words, along with experimental technology that even outclasses big tech’s voice assistants. 

Welcome to Voice Chapter 7, on today’s menu:

Big things for microWakeWord
Timers are here. 
Timers control devices
AI in control
Expand an LLM with scripts
Enhanced Media Control
Easier updates for your voice assistant


Big things for microWakeWord
At the beginning of this year wake word detection could only run on Home Assistant itself...
title: Voice Chapter 7 - Supercharged wake words and timers
